name: FallBlower
description:
FallBlower is a little project that I made for a self imposed game jam. The theme was "Autumn Leaves." 

There are 10 WAVES and a BOSS FIGHT! Try to defeat the boss!

The instructions are in the title screen, but i'll put them here as well:

WASD or ARROW KEYS to move

CLICK to use leaf blower and blow back projectiles

If the blue bar gets depleted, you have to wait for it to charge back up

I hope you enjoy! :D

All art and sounds created by me.
